# makeRenderPipelineState(descriptor:options:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Asynchronously creates a render pipeline state and reflection information.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeRenderPipelineState(descriptor: MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor, options: MTLPipelineOption, completionHandler: @escaping ((any MTLRenderPipelineState)?, MTLRenderPipelineReflection?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func makeRenderPipelineState(descriptor: MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor, options: MTLPipelineOption) async throws -> (any MTLRenderPipelineState, MTLRenderPipelineReflection?)
```

## Parameters

- **descriptor**: An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor] instance.
- **options**: An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPipelineOption] instance that represents the reflection information you want the method to generate.
- **completionHandler**: A Swift closure or an Objective-C block the method calls when it finishes creating the render pipeline state.

## Discussion

Use the graphics-rendering pipeline state to configure a render pass by calling the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderCommandEncoder/setRenderPipelineState(_:)] method of an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderCommandEncoder] instance.

## Creating render pipeline states with vertex shaders

- **makeRenderPipelineState(descriptor:completionHandler:)**: Asynchronously creates a render pipeline state.
- **makeRenderPipelineState(descriptor:options:)**: Synchronously creates a render pipeline state and reflection information in a tuple.
- **makeRenderPipelineState(descriptor:options:reflection:)**: Synchronously creates a render pipeline state and reflection information.
